text: ‘Oh ban ka lahe geukheun le meunoe Aneuk lon binoe lagoe ya Allah Wahe Tuhanku pakon roh inong Cit meunan keunong ‘eleumee Allah Bah that jih inong Tuhan Neuteupue Ngon ureueng lakoe han sabe ceudah Lon boh nama jih teuma Mariyam Beu jioh chetan Neubri ya Allah Aneuk cuco jih teuma pih meunan Beu jioh chetan kutokan Allah
